item.description:
Bookcrossers talk about where and how to release books and why bookcrossing is a great idea. Also bookrings, bookrays, bookrelays and how they work. We also talk about books we like... it's a good way to pick up ideas for what to read next!

This site has free wifi. If someone can bring a laptop computer that can access it, then we can register books at the meetup.

For more information, see http://www.cassavalou...
item.name: Boston Bookcrossing November Meetup
